casebody.data:
ALLSCRIPTS HEALTHCARE, LLC
v.
ETRANSMEDIA TECHNOLOGY, INC. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 10, 2016 W. Swain Wood, Attorney at Law, Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Allscripts Healthcare, LLC. Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, for Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

*265The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of November 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
